Body: I bought an HTC Incredible 2 on Amazon and found out that it is modded with Cyanogenmod 7. I didn't install it myself. Is it possible to uninstall CM7, or is it just built in? It doesnt even look like how an HTC Incredible should look or act.Im wondering if I got another version of the HTC Incredible 2, but I didnt think there is another version.
Title: How can I uninstall the Cyanogen Mod 7 for my Htc Incredible 2?

history.Text: when my phone comes on CyanogenMod  7 comes on is it possible that i can have this uninstalled or is it just built in? It doesnt even look like how and htc incredible should look or act everything on it acts like my old phone the motorala droid X. I found something that says i can install it but i dont know if this is installed or the phone just come like that because i bought this phone on amazon and i didnt install it ..it was already like that. Im wondering if i got another version of the Htc Incredible 2 or what because i didnt think it was a another version ever made
How can I uninstall the Cyanogen Mod 7 for my Htc Incredible 2?

history.Comment: Fixed some grammar and removed an unneeded tag.
history.Text: When my phone comes on, CyanogenMod 7 comes on. Is it possible to uninstall CM7, or is it just built in? It doesnt even look like how an HTC Incredible should look or act; Everything on it acts like my old phone, the Motorala Droid X. I found something that says I can install CyanogenMod 7, but I dont know why it is already installed on the phone. It just come this way after I bought the phone on Amazon. I didn't install it myself. Im wondering if I got another version of the HTC Incredible 2, but I didnt think there is another version.
